Translation Guide to In-Game Menus

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 7, 2008 - 06:50 pm:

We don't provide translation services for the whole game, but, here are some of the menus to help players navigate:

By Thorr on Thursday, August 14, 2008 - 08:01 am:

Monster Data screens
(Work in Progress!!)

Screen 1
Monster Data 1
Name: oooooooo
Monster: (Main Breed) KXK
Age: (X years Y Months)
Rank: (E-S)
Likes: (likes..)
Dislikes: (hates..)


Screen 2
Monster Data 2
Str:-1000-KXK Rank Stars
Int:-1000-Loyalty(something)
Skill:-1000-Sensitivity: (something)
Dodge:-1000-Leniency: (something)
Def:-1000-Body Shape: (something)
Life:-1000-Fame: (Hero)


Screen 3
MonsterData 3
Ran Away:0 Revolt:0
Injury:0 Safari:0
Sickness:0 Accident:0


Screen 4
Battle Data
Tourney record:0W 0L 0 KO
Win Rate:0.0%
KO Rate:0.0%
Money Won:0G


Screen 5
Battle Data
